workflow.name: Email Verification and Enrichment from Google Sheets with Hunter and Dropcontact
workflow.description:
### Description  
This workflow automatically validates email addresses stored in a Google Sheet using Hunter Email Verifier, enriches the valid ones with Dropcontact, updates the sheet with verification and enrichment results, and sends a Slack summary showing total emails checked, valid emails, and enriched profiles.

It helps teams clean their data, improve outreach accuracy, and eliminate the manual effort of checking and researching email contacts one by one.

### How It Works  
1. The workflow triggers whenever a new row is added or updated in your Google Sheet.  
2. It reads any emails that still need to be processed.  
3. Each email is validated using Hunter Email Verifier, which returns validity and a confidence score.  
4. Emails marked as valid and above the confidence threshold are enriched with Dropcontact to gather additional profile information, including:  
   - Full name  
   - Job title  
   - Company  
   - Domain  
   - Country  
5. Invalid or low-confidence emails are marked as invalid and skipped.  
6. Verification and enrichment results are written back into the corresponding row in your Google Sheet.  
7. A Slack summary message is sent showing:  
   - Total emails processed  
   - Number of valid emails  
   - Number of enriched profiles  

### Credential Requirements  
- **Hunter Email Verifier:** Required for the email validation step.  
- **Dropcontact:** Requires a **business email address** (non-Gmail, non-Outlook, non-Yahoo) to create an account and use their API.  
- **Google Sheets:** Required for reading and updating your contact list.  
- **Slack:** Required to send the summary notification.  

### Why This Is Helpful  
- Automates a repetitive and error-prone workflow.  
- Saves Dropcontact credits by enriching only valid, high-quality emails.  
- Improves data accuracy for outreach, lead generation, and CRM imports.  
- Keeps your Google Sheet updated with clean, structured verification and enrichment results.  
- Sends a summary to Slack so your team gets instant visibility without opening the sheet.  
- Ideal for teams preparing outbound lists, cleaning CRM data, or verifying large batches of emails before campaigns.

### Customization Ideas  
- **Add a second enrichment provider** (such as Clearbit or People Data Labs) to fill in missing fields when Dropcontact does not return enough data.  
- **Send enriched contacts to a CRM**, such as HubSpot, Airtable, Pipedrive, or Notion, instead of keeping everything in Google Sheets.  
- **Create separate Slack channels** for valid vs. invalid contacts to help teams prioritize follow-up.  
- **Add quality tiers** by creating categories such as "High Confidence," "Medium Confidence," and "Low Confidence" based on the verification score.  
- **Auto-tag enriched leads** with fields like industry, employee count, or revenue if you integrate additional enrichment sources.  
- **Trigger this workflow nightly** using a Schedule node if you want to process batches instead of reacting to row updates.  
- **Automatically send outreach emails** to enriched leads using Gmail, Outlook, or Resend, after adding a safety check or approval step.  
- **Export enriched contacts to CSV** or Google Drive for easy sharing with other teams.  
- **Add duplicate detection logic** to avoid enriching the same contact multiple times.  
- **Add a notification for ‚Äúno enrichments found‚Äù** so your team knows when Dropcontact fails to return details.

parameters.subject: New Lead Email Draft - Approval Required

parameters.content:
### üìå Purpose  
Automatically process new leads from an n8n Form, generate an AI-written follow-up email, request approval from your sales team, and then send the approved email to the lead while logging everything into Airtable.

This workflow is ideal for:
- Small teams that want AI to draft emails, but still keep a human review step  
- Businesses that receive inbound inquiries and need fast, consistent follow-ups  
- Anyone who wants an automated lead-intake ‚Üí email ‚Üí CRM update pipeline  
- Teams that want to save approved/rejected drafts for future reference

Why this is helpful:
- AI handles the writing, saving your team time  
- Sales still decides what actually gets sent  
- Airtable automatically stores every lead + email draft + status  
- Everything runs from a simple form submission ‚Üí no manual copying or rewriting

Why download this template:
It gives you a polished lead-response system with human approval, CRM logging, and automated Gmail sending ‚Äî all without needing a full CRM or sales tool.

### üîß Setup Instructions  
1. **Connect credentials:** Gmail, Airtable, OpenAI.  
2. **Configure Airtable Table** with the following fields:  
   - Name  
   - Email  
   - Phone  
   - Company Name  
   - Message  
   - Status  
   - Email Draft  
   - Created On  
3. **Add Airtable Base & Table IDs** in the configuration node.  
4. **Add company details** (your name, title, email, phone, website, etc.) so the final email is branded correctly.  
5. **Set the sales approval email address** (where the draft should be sent for review).  
6. Enable the **Webhooks** node used for the approval link.  
7. Publish your n8n Form and test by submitting a new lead.

### üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting  
- **Approval link not working?**  
  Make sure the Webhook node is set to ‚ÄúProduction URL‚Äù and not ‚ÄúTest URL.‚Äù

- **Emails not sending?**  
  Verify Gmail credentials and that the ‚ÄúFrom‚Äù address is allowed by Google.

- **Airtable fields not updating?**  
  Check Base ID, Table ID, and field names match exactly.

- **Draft missing lead details?**  
  Ensure the Form field names match those referenced in the AI prompt.

- **Stuck waiting for approval?**  
  Confirm the approval webhook is receiving a request when clicked.

### üìù Lead Intake & Preparation  
This section receives a new lead from an n8n Form and prepares the information for AI processing.

Why:  
We normalize all form fields early so the AI model always receives clean, predictable data ‚Äî making email generation more accurate and consistent.

### ü§ñ Draft Generation & Human Approval  
AI writes the initial draft, then the workflow emails it to your sales team for review and approval via a secure link.

Why:  
This blends automation with human judgment ‚Äî speeding up response time while maintaining quality control.

### üìä Log Lead in Airtable & Send Final Email  
Depending on approval, this section sends the email to the lead and logs the result in Airtable.

Why:  
Your CRM stays clean and accurate ‚Äî each lead gets a clear status, timestamp, and saved email draft for reference.

Thank you for reaching out and showing interest in our services! I understand you‚Äôre looking for help with systems, and I‚Äôd love to learn more about your specific needs at Manna AI so we can provide the best possible support.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
